## Introduccion 

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
clima <- read_xlsx("clima.xlsx")
consumoenergetico <- read_xlsx('consumoenergiaelectrica.xlsx')

clima$TEMP <- (as.numeric(clima$TEMP)-32)*5/9
clima <- rename(clima,temp_c = TEMP)
colnames(consumoenergetico)
gather(consumoenergetico, fuente, produccion,Hidráulica, Térmica, Eólica, Biomasa, Fotovoltaica )
```
